boardgame.name: Kanagawa
Канагава
神奈川學苑
boardgame.description: 1840: In Kanagawa, the great bay of Tokyo, the Master Hokusai decided to open a painting school to share his art with his disciples. You are one of these disciples, and more than anything, you want to prove yourself worthy of the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;crazy, old artist_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo;. Follow his teachings to expand your studio and paint your preferred subjects (Trees, Animals, Characters, Buildings), all while paying attention to the changing of the seasons in order to make the most harmonious print_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;hellip; the one that will become the work of your lifetime!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2016 Golden Geek Best Board Game Artwork _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Presentation Nominee
boardgame.boardgameversion: Bureau De Juegos Spanish first edition
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Ep 070 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; 3rd Anniversary Special _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Tournament to the Death!!!
Episode 1: Order of the Gilded Compass, Troyes, Automobiles, SeaFall, Kanagawa
